88DADB60C0614BE9B3E78C9D4D33089E.description:
Advanced: I can reflect on how I interact with the language and culture outside of my
language class.

0E6E0365192D4E1287361A2D36AF7305.description:
Intermediate: I can self-assess at the end of a term on the progress I have made and what I
have learned.

5C0707F20DC847F78C49F622E54C5644.description: Intermediate: I can make decisions about topics that will be studied for the course.

8B52C133A69541E6ABD783C268089022.description: Novice: I can set goals for the progress I intend to achieve during the term.

FD0041C0454645BF893E890454D67CF0.description:
Lifelong Learning - Learners set goals and reflect on their progress in using
languages for enjoyment, enrichment, and advancement.

B92C528A61034AE884F3478D0C2B1A79.description:
Advanced: I can use the target language both within and beyond the classroom to
interact, collaborate, and contribute in my community and the globalized world.

10E53EC4C2E04EB6855CC8485EDDC60F.description:
Intermediate: I can use the target language both within and beyond the classroom to
interact and collaborate in my community and in the globalized world.

D28979881F674F52B50CE723E36DC85A.description:
Novice: I can use the target language both within and beyond the classroom to
interact and learn in my community and in the globalized world.

4C661CA801EC45A2987355511362B574.description:
School and Global - Learners use the language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact and collaborate in their community and the globalized world.

F75410B27EC44AB187D127875B341B05.description:
Communities: Communicate and interact with cultural competence in order to participate in
multilingual communities at home and around the world.

17C6C48C75DA42D595782406746F3A6A.description:
Advanced: I can explain, provide details, and give specific examples of differences
and similarities between my own language and the target language.

D7FD589C17ED469FA6C870B9E191820C.description: Intermediate: I can explain the differences and similarities between the target and native languages.

FBFC26A267B34E848323E7FECB4C8177.description:
Novice: I can recognize the differences and similarities between my native language
and through my learning of the target language.

06013B5D447A40A4875CD4DE581DF1F5.description:
Language Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the nature of the language through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

85FFBEB417D74FFC8098FA980CEAC2B1.description:
Advanced: I can explain, provide details about, and give specific examples of
differences and similarities between my community and cultures of the target language.

7480929991DF485BA44150089F0DC513.description:
Intermediate: I can explain and provide generic details about differences and
similarities between my community and cultures of the target language.

FB84AB76C1484716BE4B234E223985BA.description:
Novice: I can identify differences and similarities between my community and
cultures of the target language.

C6A0BCCBD4E84ACF9AFC5ECC56670F66.description:
Cultural Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

CD9355547DB24561A0A5CD7046C7129A.description:
Comparisons: Develop insight into the nature of language and culture in order to interact with
cultural competence.

1292470DFD3C40F197C2FA31A72D0373.description:
Advanced: I can think critically and creatively solve problems across disciplines
using the target language.

A98F685921FC4EF69973F35E80BB99FF.description:
Intermediate: I can expand my knowledge of other disciplines while using the target
language.

DD2C2040561C4A9587A9E82C2D00A281.description: Novice: I can connect content from other disciplines to the target language.

16847483CB5147D382BD8CFCAC41E64F.description:
Making Connections - Learners build, reinforce, and expand their knowledge of
other disciplines while using the target language to develop critical thinking and to solve problems
creatively.

AC512BBC9EC34029B058474CB56EB734.description:
Advanced: I can independently access and evaluate in-depth information and
perspectives that are available through the target languages and its cultures.

313AC59B36E4413D9C2A1A8C72AC2765.description:
Intermediate: With limited guidance and support from the teacher, I can access and
evaluate complex information and perspectives that are available through the target language
and its cultures.

E8F6C5F12EEB458EAD9BB8CA07992ED9.description:
Novice: With guidance and support from the teacher, I can access and evaluate
basic information and perspectives that are available through the target language and its
cultures.

DD3387FEE62A437F87EF737AA913CBF6.description:
Acquiring Information and Diverse Perspectives - Learners access and
evaluate information and diverse perspectives that are available through language and its cultures.

2847DE866BAB4A3C8C2720171F92D99B.description:
Connections: Connect with other disciplines and acquire information and diverse perspectives in
order to use the language to function in academic and career-related situations.

108C737B3F374FBEBF35DD6A104136F9.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can reflect on how a variety of practices within
familiar and social situations are related to perspectives.

B5B494CC37CF4A1F9AE5298E71BB8817.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can reflect on how a variety of products of public
and personal interest are related to perspectives.

1FB461B1DA6E414C979FA42A818690D2.description:
Advanced - I can reflect on the diversity among products and practices and
how they relate to perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

587157BEB77E468499963EFECD832413.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can compare practices related to everyday life and
personal interests or studies.

A8FFAAC997A345B6A234524810279854.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can compare products related to everyday life and
personal interests or studies.

94FB8305776C449EB3B1CDD7F983FDF7.description:
Intermediate - I can explain through comparisons between products and
practices to help me understand perspectives in the target cultures and in my own

4E052077144D4F1CAD194B09D1B580EE.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can identify some typical practices related to
familiar everyday life.

1358791D04324DC2997946B42864D180.description:
In my own and other cultures, I can identify some typical products related to
familiar everyday life.

03BD864A74474301A74D8DF30DA38654.description:
Novice - I can investigate products and practices to help me understand
perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

788EC96B135549618785BAE156AD1F0F.description:
Relating Cultural Practice and Products to Perspectives - Learners use language to investigate, explain, and reflect on the relationship
between the practices and products to perspectives of the target cultures.

823BA5C3A47848F499B80A8DD17EFC14.description:
I can demonstrate awareness of subtle differences among cultural behaviors and
adjust my behavior accordingly in familiar and some unfamiliar situations.

CC752E85198C4C93A4DFFFE1C8783AA3.description:
I can converse comfortably and respectfully with others from the target culture in
familiar and some unfamiliar situations and show an understanding of cultural differences.

46F2C9B81BFA4D9FBCDB3D987BDC7D16.description:
Advanced - I can interact at a competent level in familiar and some unfamiliar
contexts

FA036ED212764898BBB597D54C0374B2.description:
I can recognize that significant differences in behaviors exist among cultures, use
appropriate learned behaviors and avoid major social blunders.

02B1BBAFAE3C4EA88490F4A9E77F2585.description:
I can converse with peers from the target culture in familiar situations at school,
work, online, or play, and identify basic cultural similarities and differences.

75E2C0927DF34AC9BAB8D2B76E2E55C9.description: Intermediate - I can interact at a functional level in familiar contexts.

FDC2E7A55508423B80D642D2E3E18DC7.description:
I can use appropriate rehearsed behaviors and recognize some obviously
inappropriate behaviors in familiar and everyday situations.

A597701FFBB74DA691AC50CDC86ABAAF.description:
I can communicate with others from the target culture in familiar everyday
situations, using memorized language and showing basic cultural awareness.

3A98437DDB1E47D3BD90B960DBA05E6B.description: Novice - I can interact at a survival level in some familiar everyday contexts

5E8C2469A21840A0A33BAE152A240320.description:
Interacting with Cultures - Learners use language to interact
with others in and from another culture.

2867E2F09BA44CAEB33A33787A16252C.description: Cultures: Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

254891D35FB248BAAEAFF79B20E6E96B.description:
I can give complex detailed narrations and information beyond the concrete, often
addressing abstract experiences or hypothetical issues.

123402F6C4174158A37152FF59BB0DE3.description:
I can tell stories and present information based on concrete experiences on
academic, social, and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs and
dialogue across time frames and moods.

159BE1ABEC2443B3B05EC2EAD1B782F8.description:
I can tell stories and present information about personal experiences framed by
my school, my community, and global events, using paragraphs or dialogue across time
frames and moods.

93E0461D1F024DE0B46E4951AF24AECD.description:
Advanced - I can deliver detailed and organized presentations on familiar as
well as unfamiliar concrete topics, in paragraphs and using various time frames through spoken,
written, or gestured language.

071D07575DCD4CB89620E7538F75DA77.description:
I can tell stories and/or present information about school and community events
and personal experiences, using a few short paragraphs of writing or using dialogue, often
across various time frames.

C1EEA288340D494B9329D484CC153E09.description:
I can tell a story and/or present information about my life, activities, events and
other social experiences, using sentences and series of connected sentences.

C5B9AD14D03D4208A5E363F6800EE355.description:
I can present personal information about my life, activities, and events, using
original, simple sentences.

5B15FE0CC0E149D7AC66CB7A0142FA10.description:
Intermediate - I can communicate information, make presentations, and
express my thoughts about familiar topics using sentences and series of connected sentences through
spoken, written, or gestured language

61DA5DE306C94DFB8D81BDAE263986E7.description:
I can present personal information about my life and activities, using memorized
simple sentences most of the time.

B48E2E3ADFA0435A9B1823531056F805.description:
I can present information about myself, my interests and my activities which
includes likes and dislikes using a mixture of practiced or memorized words, phrases and
simple sentences.

4DD8470E579C4634B882775DCB3B3673.description:
I can introduce myself and express my likes and dislikes using practiced or
memorized words and phrases, with the help of gestures or visuals.

DF7279E4C4C5463DADCE2FAEF73ABE5C.description:
Novice - I can present information on both very familiar and everyday topics
using a variety of practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences through spoken or
written language supported by visuals and gestures.

DA303C6DC08C436B9625E0CE31D47450.description:
Presentational -  Learners present information, concepts, and ideas to inform,
explain, persuade, and narrate on a variety of topics using appropriate resources and adapting to various
audiences of listeners, readers, or viewers.

11F8AA58F5DB4274A01625CA01F51F36.description:
I can follow the flow of ideas and nuances from different viewpoints in
conversations and discussions

3E5983A44F314C858AE192DBF8708AAF.description:
In both informational and fictional written texts, I can follow the flow of ideas and
infer meaning from complex language on unfamiliar, abstract topics and follow the flow of
ideas and some nuances with different viewpoints in most fictional texts.

B6B462806AF24EC4B5DF64B02BF3E6C2.description:
I can understand the main message and most supporting details across time
frames and moods in conversations and discussions.

39CC3895AC874FC3A8108E5F33843543.description: In both informational and fictional written texts, I can understand the underlying message and most supporting details across time frames and moods.

78841D95098C45BAA2D37A9E7544BE55.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can understand the main message and
supporting details across time frames and moods.

36ED278DF3D64512A9129F42D0532823.description:
In both informational and fictional written texts, I can identify the underlying
message and supporting details across time frames and moods.

A0E986A9CE694A57BB3B0B6EE751D3FD.description:
Advanced - I can understand the message and supporting details on a wide
variety of familiar and general interest topics across various time frames from complex, organized
spoken or written texts.

CAAB97A77B3142A4A1988425628A2F3F.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can usually understand the main idea and
flow of events expressed in various time frames in conversations and discussions.

CB08B0A20DB34370AC3AAC2629CA3DD1.description:
In both informational and fictional written texts, I can usually follow the main
message in various time frames in straightforward, and sometimes descriptive,
paragraph-length texts.

4111BDB398DE473C8CDCDE5D1F83C0D7.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can understand the main idea and key
information in short straightforward conversations.

94DCBB55ED804DE5A20B1D2882F94248.description:
In written texts, I can understand the main idea and key information in short
straightforward informational and/or fictional texts.

8C261D9EB5CB4B888A6533318EA02923.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can identify the main idea in short
conversations.

EBF7D868FB97483CA3DF0A5EE563EA76.description:
In written texts, I can identify the topic and related information from simple
sentences in short informational and/or fictional texts.

7FE4933A0FC74E279237EC7611BF8A02.description:
Intermediate - I can understand the main idea and various pieces of information
on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences in spoken, written, or gestured
contexts.

E20824E9EB234483B1454F8D468AA257.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can understand familiar questions and
statements from simple sentences in conversations.

A1B92DCA52E74FAD896EF6C3848BB9CC.description:
In written texts, I can identify the topic and isolated facts from simple sentences
in informational and/or short fictional texts.

494A26899D9F4894AD1C7BCDE9BCC6E3.description: In conversations and discussions, I can identify basic facts from memorized words and phrases when they are supported by gestures or visuals in conversations.

4C448CFA4301409684C1647BD10B0FD2.description:
In written texts, I can identify basic facts from memorized words and phrases
when they are supported by visuals in informational and/or fictional texts.

3910F1B64CE14E09BBBD4694C7C6EB98.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can understand memorized or familiar words
when they are supported by gestures or visuals in conversation.

B4012C92707D4EB79265F3390C94E57D.description:
In written texts, I can identify memorized or familiar words when they are
supported by visuals in informational and/or fictional texts.

8F4DF7FCE01E48568DC86D4D0844FAA9.description:
Novice - I can identify the general topic and some basic information in both
very familiar and everyday contexts by recognizing practiced or memorized words, phrases, and
simple sentences in spoken, written, or gestured contexts.

272D49F896A745D9B37A1CA8F0FA8052.description:
Interpretive -  Learners understand, interpret, and analyze what is heard, read, or
viewed on a variety of topics.

37EC764BC91B43F69FCDF0D167166D53.description:
I can discuss and sometimes debate a variety of complex concrete and some abstract
academic, social, and professional topics and often deal with related issues hypothetically, using precise
questions and explanations.

0A6C64B654BC4E7D922C19961C463904.description:
I can maintain discussions on a wide variety of familiar and unfamiliar concrete topics of
personal and general interest, and sometimes academic, social or professional topics, by using probing
questions and providing detailed responses across time frames.

D0A09E0EF3FF4601B25C336C4B149ED4.description:
I can exchange information and ideas in discussions on a variety of familiar and
concrete academic and social topics, using a few simple paragraphs or discourse across
major time frames and moods.

A2707BF3A62E4BE8B1F0BAAEDCE1CAC6.description:
Advanced - I can maintain spontaneous spoken, written, or gestured
conversations and discussions across various time frames on familiar, as well as unfamiliar, concrete
topics, using a series of connected sentences and probing questions

DD02B7840CA24E63854F58CA33B92CAA.description:
I can exchange information in conversations and discussions on a variety of
familiar and concrete topics that I have researched, using connected sentences that may
combine to form paragraphs and asking a variety of questions, often across various time
frames.

9D0FBAE1D24542CFA200DBB39249FD14.description:
I can exchange information in conversations on familiar topics and some researched topics,
creating sentences and series of sentences and asking a variety of follow-up questions.

35E536F30FF842B8AF907941EF7BB7BA.description:
I can request and provide information in conversations on familiar topics by creating
simple sentences and asking appropriate follow-up questions.

F222F09E2E1E4227A7F8005E2000A811.description:
Intermediate - I can participate in spontaneous spoken, written, or gestured
conversations on familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences to ask and answer a variety of
questions.

4A76DD2983CE411699A12063609D68AE.description:
I can request and provide information by asking and answering practiced and
some original questions on familiar and everyday topics, using simple sentences most of the
time.

0791B677C3A348B09CD97190DEAB3D60.description: I can request and provide information by asking and answering a few simple questions on very familiar and everyday topics, using a mixture of practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple sentences.

7E4C6BE1258F4411B77885F562D3365F.description: I can provide information by answering a few simple questions on very familiar topics, using practiced or memorized words and phrases, with the help of gestures or visuals.

B2E7E99DCABF49118011DEC25263BD7F.description:
Novice - I can communicate in guided spoken, written, or gestured conversations on
both very familiar and everyday topics using a variety of practiced or memorized words, phrases, simple
sentences, and questions

4E828FBEB7274B31823E5B26664E2A87.description:
Interpersonal - Learners interact and negotiate meaning in spoken, gestured, or
written conversations to share information, reactions, feelings, and opinions.

C37ECB364DEC4444A1D58632219F3235.description:
Communication: Communicate effectively in more than one language in order to function in a
variety of situations and for multiple purposes
